VerificationResults.body: Please return to Huma to continue
EmailVerification.mobile.subject: Email Verification
EmailVerification.mobile.title: Verification Code
EmailVerification.mobile.body: Here’s your Huma verification code. Enter this code into the Huma app to continue.
EmailVerification.cp.subject: Email Confirmation
EmailVerification.cp.title: Hello %{username}
EmailVerification.cp.body: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link below:
ConfirmationEmail.subject: Email Confirmation
ConfirmationEmail.title: Hello %{username}
ConfirmationEmail.subtitle: Welcome to Huma
ConfirmationEmail.body: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link below:
ResetPassword.subject: Reset Password
ResetPassword.subtitle: Reset your password
ResetPassword.body: Resetting your password is easy. Click the link below to create a new one.
InviteEmail.cp.subject: Invitation
InviteEmail.cp.title: Hello
InviteEmail.cp.subtitle: Welcome to Huma
InviteEmail.cp.body.default:
%{sender} has invited you to join the Clinician Portal as %{role}. You can read about %{role} and other roles here.

It takes around 5 minutes to sign up to the portal, and you will need your phone with you.
InviteEmail.cp.body.custom:
%{sender} has invited you to join the Clinician Portal as %{role}. You can read about roles here.

It takes around 5 minutes to sign up to the portal, and you will need your phone with you.
InviteEmail.user.subject: Invitation
InviteEmail.user.subtitle: Welcome to Huma
InviteEmail.user.body:
Your care team has invited you to Huma, a digital health tracker.

Huma is a private and secure way for you and your care team to monitor your health together.
InviteEmail.user.firstBlockText: Download the Huma app on your phone
InviteEmail.user.secondBlockText: Come back to this email and launch the app from here
UpdateRole.cp.subject: Invitation
UpdateRole.cp.title: Hello
UpdateRole.cp.subtitle: Update from Huma
UpdateRole.cp.body:
%sender has updated your access to deployments. You now
have access to %accessEntityCount %accessEntity.
ProxyLinked.push.title: Your account is now linked.
ProxyLinked.push.body: Please return to Huma to continue.
VerificationResult.subject: Identity Verification Result
VerificationResult.title: Hello %{username}
VerificationResult.subtitle: Verification ready
VerificationResult.body: Your identify verification is ready. Please return to Huma:
AssignNewRole.cp.subtitle: Your role has changed
AssignNewRole.cp.body:
%sender just changed your role from %oldRole to %newRole. This may affect your use of Huma.

You can read about roles here.
AssignNewRole.cp.subject: Roles update from Huma
AssignNewMultiResourceRole.cp.subtitle: You've been added to a new deployment
AssignNewMultiResourceRole.cp.body:
%sender just added you as %newRole to %deploymentName.

You can read about roles here.
AssignNewMultiResourceRole.cp.subject: Roles update from Huma
ProxyLinkedEmail.subject: You're connected
ProxyLinkedEmail.subtitle: You're connected
ProxyLinkedEmail.body: You are now connected as a helper. Return to Huma to start inputting data into the app or website on behalf of the patient.
PasswordChangedEmail.subject: Your password has been updated
PasswordChangedEmail.body: If this was not you, we recommend changing your account password and contacting App Support or your dedicated support centre.
PasswordChangedEmail.title: Your password has been updated

InviteEmail.proxy.body:
%sender invited you to Huma as a helper.

Being a helper means you can enter data on behalf of %dependant.

Sign up details
Email: %email
InviteEmail.proxy.subtitle: Welcome to Huma
InviteEmail.proxy.firstBlockText: Download the Huma app on your phone
InviteEmail.proxy.secondBlockText: Come back to this email and launch the app from here
InviteEmail.proxy.subject: Helper invitation
Appointment.Reminder.title: Attend scheduled appointment
DataPushNotification.title: Download your data
DataPushNotification.successBody: Your file with all your data from Huma is now ready to download.
DataPushNotification.failBody: Your file with all your data from Huma is failed to download.
Notification.export.title: Hello %{username}
Notification.export.subject: Data Export Status
Notification.export.subtitle.success: Your file with all your data from Huma is now ready to download.
Notification.export.subtitle.error: Your file with all your data from Huma is failed to download.
Notification.export.body.success: We’ve exported a file of all the data you previously uploaded to Huma. The link is available for 7 days.
Notification.export.body.error: Please open Huma and request download again.
hu_module_config_default_disclaimer_text: If you think you may be experiencing a medical emergency, call the emergency services immediately.
